# notationName

**Instance Property**

Returns the name of the notation associated with the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var notationName: String? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The name of the notation associated with the receiver.

## Discussion

Notations are applicable to unparsed external entities, processing instructions, and some attribute values.

## Managing DTD Identifiers

- **isExternal**
- **publicID**: Returns the public identifier associated with the receiver.
- **systemID**: Returns the system identifier associated with the receiver.

items.description: Returns the public identifier associated with the receiver.
